title: 07/26/2021 - HOUR 2 - Rodgers, Olympics, Deshaun
itunes:title: 07/26/2021 - HOUR 2 - Rodgers, Olympics, Deshaun
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--pleads with the Green Bay Packers' brass not to trade their reigning NFL MVP. Also, Doug ponders if there is a summer Olympic sport a regular person could train for and actually compete in four years later. Plus, Aaron Wilson of Sports Talk 790 in Houston brings Doug up to speed on what Texans' quarterback Deshaun Watson is doing with himself during his time in legal limbo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
